message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $98. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short. Can you meet me at $97?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $102. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your honesty about your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short. Can you meet me at $99?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm sticking to my minimum price of $102. That's the best I can do.
